content.raw:
Maybe I'm not fully aware of all the uses for these presets, but the use-case I can think of is to have handy approximations for users to drop into their models.

If that's the case, I think we should strive for intuitive values.  I personally think phases for things other than water are not very intuitive. Along the same line, "water" immediately reminds liquid water, especially when listed next to ice, and it is the one density value most people can remember by heart. So I vote for leaving it in, since it is a nice intuitive value to compare to.
